General.Name: Perak Corporation Bhd
General.Description: Perak Corporation Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, engages in ports and logistics, property development, hospitality and tourism, and management services businesses in Malaysia. The company engages in the development of an integrated privatized project; operation of multipurpose port facilities; operation and maintenance of bulk terminal; sale and rental of port related land; and other ancillary activities. It is also involved in the township development of real property and provision of ancillary services. In addition, the company owns and operates hotels, restaurants, rest house, and theme parks; invests in properties; and provides accommodation facilities, maintenance and management, transport and travel, and project management services. Further, it offers integrated port services, such as tuggage, pilotage, berthing, stevedoring, cargo handling, storage, and ancillary services. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Ipoh, Malaysia. Perak Corporation Berhad is a subsidiary of Perbadanan Kemajuan Negeri Perak.
